message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I believe it aligns well with your needs and expectations.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing me to acquire the product while remaining within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I'm unable to accept $10,000 for the product. Based on its value to you and its intrinsic worth, I propose we settle on $11,000. This price reflects a compromise that allows you to acquire the product while ensuring a reasonable return for us.
